contest-event.event-date:
June 14, 1986 D Scottish Miners Gala Contest
Scottish Miners Gala Contest 0 Own Choice Test Piece Contest
scottish-miners-gala-contest
None
Holyrood Park, Edinburgh
Prizes 1st £120, 2nd £70, 3rd £55. March contest - 1st Lochgelly. Best Section 2 band - Fauldhouse. Best Section 3 band - Dalkeith & Bilston. Best Section 4 band Buckhaven & Methil. Deportment Kinneil Colliery.
7 bands competed.
Nov. 17, 2012, 9:25 a.m. Feb. 17, 2020, 10:25 a.m.
